Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: This offering is a former QSR restaurant located in the heart of Myrtle Beachâ€™s business and tourist district.  Myrtle Beach is a traditional tourist destination, with approximately 20 million annual visits, that has been revitalized into a diverse community with a booming economy. Currently, Myrtle Beach is the 2nd fastest growing metropolitan area nationwide. Horry County is currently home to several international companies, including aerospace, manufacturing, technology and healthcare sectors. Between these economic drivers and the continual stream of tourism dollars, Myrtle Beach is poised to continue its transformation into a dynamic and competitive business community.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Highway 501 across the street from Tanger Outlet.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The site has excellent visibility and signage opportunities. Co-Tenants include: IHOP, Myrtle Beach Spine Center, Beast Ninja and King's Kids.The site is easily accessible at a signalized intersection. Other notable retailers nearby include Carmax, Kroger, Publix and Planet Fitness.

The space is 15,636 SF and features high ceilings, a dock and roll up door.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Legends Square is located on Highway 501 across the street from Tanger Outlet's in Myrtle Beach.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Great intersection of Hwy 17 N and South Morgan's Point Road. North of IOP Connector

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideal retail location next to Blue Water Convenience store with a drive-thru and and window already in place. The space is improved with a 1,000 gallon grease trap, 4 tons of HVAC, and two HC restrooms. The listing price is $34.00 / SF NNN plus CAM TI charges estimated to be $6.50 / SF.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Ideal retail location next to Blue Water Convenience store directly across from the entrance to Park West.

address.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Carolina Park - Faison Road & Park Ave Blvd

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The site is located on a prime corner diagonally across from Costco. Suites available from 2,500 SF up to 28,000 SF with flexible layouts including patio space and free-standing options.

Located on the corner of Faison Road and Park Blvd, this project will provide excellent visibility and exposure to the thousands of vehicles per day traveling through Carolina Park on their way to Oceanside Collegiate, Wando High, Carolina Park Elementary School, Mt. Pleasant Rec fields and the thousands of homes and apartments in the neighborhood.

Site plans shown are conceptual and subject to change.

Final lease rates will vary based on the suite sizes and final site design.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Retail/Office development strategically located in Carolina Park.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Just north of Mt. Pleasant Town Center and before the Market at Oakland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 6,134 SF 2nd generation restaurant for lease. Highway 17 frontage with excellent visibility. The building provides ample parking and is situated on 3.5 Acres. Outdoor seating area can be accomodated.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Former Carrabba's For Lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Queensborough Shopping Center is home to many retailers and restaurants and is anchored by one of the busiest Publix stores in the MSA. Adjacent tenants within the Queensborough Shopping Center include the UPS Store, Angels & Rascals, Hunan Chinese Restaurant, Airavata Vapors CBD, Kids First Swim School and Paisano's Pizza The Game Show, Sally's Beauty Supply.

1,716 SF End-Cap Available. Currently operating as Hair Salon. Former tenant was Subway with Drive Thru Window. Interior space of 2640sf most recently a dry cleaners.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: This is an excellent opportunity in a bustling retail center in Mount Pleasant, SC.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Intersection of Coleman Boulevard and Houston Northcutt Boulevard in Mt. Pleasant.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Busy boutique shopping center with 35 small shops. Tenants include - Baskin Robbins, Pak Mail, Affordables, Phillips Shoes, Copper Penny, Southern Belles, Bacco's Restaurant, La Pizzeria, Smoothie King, Coralberry Cottage, CHD Interiors, Buy the Bunch, Willow Salon, Mode, Merle Norman, Coleman Collection and various apparel and gift shops.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail space in busy boutique shopping center with 35 small shops.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Excellent Retail location in the Charlestonâ€™s
famous Market Street, just off the corner of State
and Market Streets. Great location for any retail
user. Right in between Haagen Dazs and the
brand new Spectator Hotel. Landlord would like
to stay away from any uses involving cooking.
S Market Street in Historic Downtown Charleston

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideal retail location on South Market Street between Crabby Jacks and Sunglass Hut.The space has frontage on Market Street with it's own awning and has frontage on the courtyard behind the building.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 1,450 SF Retail Space for Lease on Market Street

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Steps away from East Bay Street and Meeting Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Located in Charlestonâ€™s tourist district across the street from the Historic Charleston City Market. The available space has been renovated with a new storefront, HVAC, electric, plumbing, restrooms. The space is ready for a tenant to move in.

Nearby retailers include: Beef Jerkey Outlet, Aussie Outfitters, Loose Lucy's, Sunglass Hut, Caviar & Bananas, and Tervis

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail - Commercial space downtown for lease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Downtown Charleston, Historic Market Area.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Great Market Street retail space with huge windows right across Market Street from the Charleston Place Hotel. 1,561 square feet of mostly open retail space. Base Rent is $32.00 NNN and CAMTI is estimated at $8.50. Tenant pays utilities and janitorial.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great Market Street retail space with huge windows right across Market Street from the Charleston Place Hotel.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on Broad Street. Broad Street is the main corridor that bisects the lower Charleston peninsula and boasts plenty of local and tourist foot traffic. The floor plan features an open layout with a large storefront. Great potential for a beautiful art gallery, boutique shop, or any street retail use.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 141 Broad Street - 1st Floor Retail

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Rare opportunity to lease retail space on Broad Street. Broad Street is the main corridor that bisects the lower peninsula and boasts plenty of local and tourist foot traffic. The floor-plan features an open layout, with potential for a beautiful art gallery, boutique or any street retail use.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 2,848 SF Ground Floor Retail Space Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on King Street. The space has excellent visibility, high foot traffic and 38 feet of frontage. The property is near numerous restaurants, new hotels, high-end street shopping and more. National retailers just steps away include Apple, Williams Sonoma, Sephora, Anthropologie, Starbucks and H&M. King Street is the Premier Charleston shopping and hospitality corridor with traffic from tourists, locals and college students. Unique layout is ideal for restaurant, retail or service use.

*Owner is willing to consider subdividing for credit Tenants*

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on King Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Construction has begun for a June 2021 Delivery. With excellent visibility and exceptional access to everywhere in Charleston and plenty of walkable amenities, 677 King will be a welcomed addition to the Charleston sky line. Two ground floor retail spaces and onsite parking will be topped with 3 efficient floors of ~17,000 sf each of Class A office space and then the 5th floor of ~13,000 sf with a private outside terrace.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Class A Retail Space on Charleston Peninsula

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
4821 Tanger Outlet Boulevard is a 3,825-square-foot retail fast food restaurant
previously occupied by Blue Ryu. Situated on 0.81 acres at Tanger Outlets in
North Charleston, the site boasts excellent visibility at a high-traffic intersection.

Constructed in 2013, the facility features ample parking, lending itself as
an attractive option for local, regional and national fast food and casual restaurants
looking to capitalize on the success of Tanger Outlets.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Turnkey Restaurant W/ Drive Thru

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Outparcel at Tanger Outlets

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Retail pad site available across from Tanger Outlets in North Charleston. The site can be developed for a single tenant or multiple tenants with space up to 3,420 SF. The site can accommodate a drive through lane and is development ready: utilities at site. Zoning is CRD.

The site is located in a major retail trade area of North Charleston near Tanger Outlets, Walmart & Sams Club. An attractive option for local, regional and national retailers looking to capitalize on the success of Tanger Outlets, Charleston Airport, Boeing and the Charleston Convention Center.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail pad site available across from Tanger Outlets in North Charleston.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 1316 Red Bank Road across from Goose Creek High School.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Harbour Lake Plaza is a Food Lion anchored shopping center in growing Goose Creek. Other tenants include H&R Block, Cricket, Rent a Center, Cash Credit, Los Altos Taquerias and several neighborhood services such as a nail salon, an ABC store and a Chinese restaurant etc. The vacancy is a former wings take out restaurant. Some equipment remains. There is also a space of 8450sf (former CVS) next to the Food Lion.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Harbour Lake Plaza is a Food Lion anchored shopping center in growing Goose Creek.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Former HH Gregg box located directly across from the North Rivers Town Center a Target anchored center on Rivers Ave. Located on Rivers Ave the main retail corridor of North Charleston with a signalized intersection and full visibility. The box has Immediate access to I-26 with traffic counts of 149,800 VPD. The building has ample parking with 112 surface lot parking spaces Strong daytime population from Charleston International Airport, Boeing, Trident Technical College, Tanger Outlets, and other regional and national draws. Area population continues to grow at an accelerated pace

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject property is a former QSR restaurant located in Anderson, SC.  Anderson is included in the Greenville â€“ Spartanburg â€“ Anderson MSA, which boasts a population of over 1.2 million, making it the most populous MSA in South Carolina. The property is located in the heart of the Clemson Boulevard node, which is the primary retail trade area for the City of Anderson and surrounding counties.  Consumers from communities such as Clemson, Seneca and parts of Northeast Georgia regularly trade to Clemson Boulevard in Anderson for shopping and dining.
